text: Liiga also known as SM-liiga from 1975 to 2013, is the top professional ice hockey league in Finland. It is generally thought of as one of the top leagues in Europe. It started in 1975. SM is a common abbreviation for Suomen mestaruus, "Finnish championship". Category:Ice hockey leagues Category:1975 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Finland Category:2013 disestablishments in Europe Category:Sports organizations of Finland
title: Liiga
